results.title: Custom word bracelet, handmade bracelet with personalized text, adjustable size, lettering (infinity, love, peace, hope and so on)
results.description:
Handmade wire bracelet with your favourite word!

This listing is for 1 -made to order- bracelet. Every bracelet is adjustable and made of a word/symbol of aluminium plus a cotton waxed cord. You can choose between 9 colors: silver, browny, pink, blue, black, light blue, red, orange or green. 
You can also choose the cord color, between black, green or violet. Write the color of the cord in a note when purchasing. Thank you!

You can choose between a wide range of words. If you want a word which isn't in the list, choose ''custom word'' and then write me the word in a message. Every word is possible! The design of this bracelets is good for words up to 8-10 letters. If you'd like longest words or short sentences, check out the dedicated listing here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/159227371/custom-word-bracelet-handmade-bracelet?ref=shop_home_active

It is also possible to choose a symbol: the infinite symbol or the treble clef. 

If you purchase more than one bracelet, you can create sweet sentences: for example live-laugh-love, peace and love, be happy, love you, you and me, the name of your beloved and so on. 

All bracelets are adjustable thanks to the "double fisherman's knot" closing system. If you need a particularly big size write me a note.

Each bracelet is totally handmade, that's why no piece can be identical to the other - but all are made with great commitment and care.

See also: 
The custom word ring https://www.etsy.com/listing/152538439/custom-word-ring-handmade-ring-with?ref=shop_home_feat
The custom word necklace https://www.etsy.com/listing/129664479/love-necklace-or-bracelet-custom-word?ref=shop_home_active
The notepad ring https://www.etsy.com/listing/155282333/notepad-ring-handmade-ring-with-mini?ref=shop_home_feat

results.title: Printable - Live Love Laugh - Digital Download - Typography Digital Art Print - 8x10 12x18 16x20 20x30 JPEGs ALL Sizes Included
results.description:
This listing is an INSTANT DOWNLOAD. 

This means that you will receive the artwork immediately & it is your to keep & save as a digital file! :)


What this means:
• Once you've purchased this listing you will be re-directed to the download section
• Download the ZIP file
• Save it & Print it. Gift it or frame it!

You will receive the 8" x 10", 12" x 18" 16" x 20" and 20" x 30" JPEG files of this artwork.
• Files are saved at 300dpi, Maximum-Quality for optimal print clarity.

Included in your download:
ZIP FILE containing 4 JPEG files sized at:
• 8" x 10"
• 12" x 18"
• 16" x 20"
• 20" x 30"

Instructions:

DOWNLOADING
Once your payment has processed Etsy will immediately provide you with a link to your download. Simply click on the link to download the file and save it to your computer. Alternatively you can access your files by opening your Etsy related email address and click on the button ‘View your files on Etsy’. You will be taken to a download page where you can download your files.

UNZIPPING
All files are compressed in ZIP folders so will simply need to be unzipped and you're ready to go! To unzip a folder on a Mac, double-click it. To open a zipped file on a PC, you can double-click or right-click to open it. You’ll need an unzipping program like WinZip (which is free) to unpack the .zip file.

PRINTING
You can print the artwork on your home printer or if you’d prefer to leave the printing to someone else you can take the files to your local printers or use an online printing lab.

**Remember that the different print settings on your computer, the type of paper used, and your printer brand can affect the color and final quality of your prints.

Print as many as you need either for yourself or as gifts. The digital file may not be shared.

If you have any trouble or have any questions don't hesitate to get in touch!


>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

© Meridian & Main Design 2015.

All rights reserved. Files are for personal use only.
Not to be shared, sold or distributed.
Not for commercial use.

https://www.etsy.com/shop/meridianandmain/policy

results.title: Six Strand Bracelet. Swiss Blue Topaz, White Jade, Mother of Pearl, Swarovski. Gold Filled, Gold Vermeil Live Love Laugh, Sunburst Charm
results.description:
Note: At checkout you will be asked to enter the bracelet 'length'. What you enter here is the ACTUAL 'Wrist Size'. Thanks! CateSwiss Blue Topaz Boho Bracelet. Six-strands of Blue Topaz, White Jade, Mother of Pearl, Swarovski Crystals, Gold Vermeil Live Love Laugh & Sun Charm. Jewelry Gift for Her

🌞SUNSHINE SUMMERTIME...soft colors of yellow, goldenrod, sweet cream, peachy-pink, white pearl and sky blue. Six-strand bracelet composed of five strands of beads; the sixth strand is a delicate 14k gold filled ball chain with an 18k Gold Vermeil* bar stamped with the words: 'Live Love Laugh.' Authentic and always gorgeous Swarovski crystals in Crystal Antique Pink and Light Rose. And, fire-polished Czech crystal beads - clear crystal with 24k gold linings.

Then I've added three amazingly beautiful, faceted, genuine, Earth-mined Swiss Blue Topaz 'rondelle' gemstones and a pretty little 'Sunburst' sun charm made in 18k Gold Vermeil.

Luscious and opulent and just gorgeous in my opinion.

SILK CORD CLOSURE...Multi-strand beaded bracelet, strung on 100% Natural silk cord**, hand-dyed a gorgeous sunny 'goldenrod' yellow...adjustable closure. All genuine gemstones and materials. Adjustable braided closure.

* 3 MICRON VERMEIL...While the USA standard for authentic 'Vermeil' is 2.5 microns of gold over 92.5 % (Sterling) Silver, our supplier of Vermeil plates their products a full 3 microns of 18k gold.

** Griffith brand 100% Natural Silk Cord. High tensile strength, designed for stringing pearls and heavy beads. 

🌞CUSTOM COMPLIMENTARY LUXURY GIFT WRAP
Ooh La La Rouge offers seven color themes for you to choose from....a few themes are shown in the photos. To see more of our luxury **free** gift wrap themes - and see the full listing of what comes with your purchase, follow the link to the 'Gift Wrap Listing, below:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/555318676/complimentary-velvet-satin-gift-wrap?ref=shop_home_


.

results.title: Aqua Boho Beaded Bracelet. Six-strands of White Opal, White Jade Gems, Mother-of-Pearl, Swarovski, Vermeil, Gold Fill Jewelry Gift for Her
results.description:
Aqua Blue & White Beaded Boho Bracelet. Six-strand Jewelry Gift for Her. 18k Gold Vermeil 'Live Love Laugh' Bar. White Opal, White Jade, White Agate, Mother-of-Pearl, Translucent Aqua Howlite, Gold Filled Chain, Custom-dyed Silk Cord, Swarovski Crystals. Genuine Gemstones. Handmade USA. 

🐬BY THE SEA...
The soft colors of the Caribbean sea...transparent aqua turning to frothy whites as the water crashes to the shore.

Luscious, rich luxurious boho...the 'By the Sea' bracelet..Mother of Pearl; Iridescent orbs of Opal (Lab-made, so they are perfect); Swarovski flashes of icy Aurora Borealis crystals; Earth-mined, opaque White Jade and a White Agate with a pearly essence. Aqua Howlite. And, something new here...an 18k Gold Vermeil* bar with the words: "Live, Love, Laugh." The bar is centered on a 14k Gold Filled 'Ball' chain. Gobs of Gold Vermeil faceted beads and 6mm 14k Gold Filled beads. Gorgeous.

(Photo 5 features the same design in another color way...this ‘stacked/layered’ design looks very lush, in my opinion!)

All genuine, authentic materials. Strung on an aqua blue, custom-dyed silk cord*. Adjustable braided closure.

*Griffith brand 100% Natural Silk Cord. High tensile strength, designed for stringing pearls and heavy beads.

OPTIONS:
Gobs of options! I absolutely love making these bracelets - and the choices for color themes are endless - so if you would prefer a different color scheme, I can do it! Also, the precious metal choices are Sterling Silver/Fine Silver, Yellow or Rose Gold Fill and Yellow or Rose Vermeil. Just send me a message to discuss custom orders.

* While the USA standard for authentic 'Vermeil' is 2.5 microns of gold over 92.5 % (Sterling) Silver, our supplier of Vermeil plates 3 microns of gold.

BRACELET SIZE (please use this method of sizing for this bracelet design - not the instructions in FAQs, which are appropriate for a different style of bracelet)
Please measure your wrist size. You can use a fabric tape measure or even a cord and a ruler. Please measure twice to be sure...and then enter that number at checkout. Your bracelet will be made approximately 1.0 inch larger than the wrist measurement you select. With the adjustable sliding closure, you will be able to add about 2.0 inches to the length for your personal comfort as well as easy on and off.

🐳CUSTOM COMPLIMENTARY LUXURY GIFT WRAP
Ooh La La Rouge offers seven color themes for you to choose from....a few themes are shown in the photos. To see more of our luxury **free** gift wrap themes - and see the full listing of what comes with your purchase, follow the link to the 'Gift Wrap Listing, below:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/555318676/complimentary-velvet-satin-gift-wrap?ref=shop_home_

results.title: Alive - Ahaha - Fuck - Cross Stitch Pattern
results.description:
This design was created as a special request because of the new TikTok response to ‘Live, Laugh Love’ a new and better version! Alive, Ahaha, Fuck! 

The pattern uses 9 DMC colours and only uses full cross stitches. The finished dimensions of the stitched area is 6.9in x 4.9in. on 14 ct. It is 96 x 68 stitches; and was designed to fit nicely in a standard 5x7 frame. 

With the purchase of this pattern you will receive 3 PDF files - they are all the same and just in different formats to accommodate your personal preference. They are black/white symbols with a colour background, coloured symbols and black and white versions.

results.title: Live Laugh Lurk Nessie Custom Vinyl Decal
results.description:
Live Laugh Lurk with Nessie creepin'. This custom designed vinyl decal is sure to show your adoration for the cryptids (and really, who doesn't love them some Nessie!?)

Measurements (can be made in custom sizes!):
6in x 6in

Made with 651 or 631 oracle vinyl in our home based vinyl & sublimation shop.

Looking for a larger or smaller size? Convo me and let's get you a custom order built. :)

**Colors shown on your screen may not reflect exact color of vinyl. The colors reflected on your computer screen are approximations of the actual colors.**

Application Instructions -
· Rub vinyl decal with a plastic card (credit card, drivers license, etc.) to smooth any air pockets that may have occurred during shipping.
· Prepare surface by cleaning area thoroughly. Avoid using Windex, as it can leave a residue
· Carefully separate the transfer sheet from the backing. Make sure that all vinyl decal pieces are on the transfer sheet.
· Position the decal over the surface to be applied and carefully rub over it with a plastic card to ensure good adhesion.
· Wait 30 seconds and carefully remove the clear transfer sheet.
